content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
• No new structures have been successfully constructed on the map. Multiple recovery attempts were made to supply Automation Science Packs by placing a Lab at (0.5, 2.5), but all lab placement and crafting trials failed because no Lab existed in the inventory and required sub‐ingredients (such as iron‐gear‐wheels, electronic circuits, and copper cables) were missing. 
• Although the agent retrieved references to existing furnaces—one at Position(5.0, 5.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron plates and another at Position(–27.0, –60.0) used for copper ore smelting—these were not created by the agent and no new production structure has been added.

ERROR TIPS
• get_entities API usage errors
 – When retrieving entities, ensure the function is called with the correct parameters. Avoid using unsupported keywords (like “radius”) and supplying unexpected positional arguments.
• Lab placement failures
 – Confirm that the Lab item is present in the inventory before attempting placement and verify that the target position is valid and unoccupied.
• Iteration on a None value
 – Always check that the result from an entity-retrieval call isn’t None before iterating over it; use a fallback (such as an empty list) when no entities are returned.
• Lab crafting resource shortages
 – Before crafting a Lab, verify the complete resource chain. Ensure that sufficient sub-ingredients (e.g. iron-gear-wheels, copper-cables, and electronic circuits) are available by establishing proper intermediary production (smelting for iron plates and copper plates, followed by processing into gears and circuits).
